sys_script.name: match tracker to servicing

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_bf1c5ff92f0231100e05235df699b603
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_919130_loaner_0_vehicle_servicing</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_919130_loaner_0_vehicle_servicing">ticket_status=closed^EQ<item display_value="Closed" endquery="false" field="ticket_status" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="closed"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>match tracker to servicing</name><order>200</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
var vehTrackerSysID  = current.vehicle_servicing; // Get the sys_id Of the linked Vehicle Tracker record
if (vehTrackerSysID) {
 var vehTracker = new GlideRecord('x_919130_loaner_0_vehicle_tracker'); // Create a GlideRecord for the Vehicle Tracker table

if (vehTracker.get(vehTrackerSysID)) {
	//set the Vehicle Status of the vehicle Tracker to match the Servcing ticket
	vehTracker.setValue('vehicle_status',current.vehicle_status);

	//set the Ticket Status of the Vehicle Tracker to "closed"
	vehTracker.setValue('tracker_status', 'closed');

	vehTracker.update(); // Save the changes to the Vehicle Tracker record
}
}
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-10-23 20:57:45</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>bf1c5ff92f0231100e05235df699b603</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>match tracker to servicing</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Loaner Vehicle Request and Inventory." source="x_919130_loaner_0">be241cba2f1571100e05235df699b615</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Loaner Vehicle Request and Inventory.">be241cba2f1571100e05235df699b615</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_bf1c5ff92f0231100e05235df699b603</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-11-07 22:22:39</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=bf1c5ff92f0231100e05235df699b603"/></record_update>
